content: **this is a pay what you want pattern use the code karma50 for 50% off the original price or use the code karma100 for a free copy thank you for your support this crochet coaster pattern features a simple yet elegant stitch design complemented by a textured bobble border the straightforward stitch creates a sturdy functional base while the playful bobble edging adds a decorative touch making each coaster both practical and visually appealing suitable for crocheters of all levels this project offers a quick and satisfying way to practice basic techniques while creating a lovely handmade accessory for your home this pattern is designed using dk weight yarn and a 4 5mm hook i recommend choosing a synthetic or plant-based fiber for the coaster as these materials are easy to care for the coaster is worked in the round using extended single_crochet stitches with increases in every round the last round features a decorative bobble round since this is a small project gauge is not critical this pattern is written for one size which should fit most mugs perfectly if you find it too small or too large feel free to experiment with different gauges or adjust the number of increase rounds this is a beginner-friendly pattern that utilizes basic stitches and includes written instructions for the bobble stitch additionally there are links to video tutorials for all the special techniques thank you for choosing my pattern i hope you enjoyed it you may sell as many of the finished items as you wish but if you share on social media please give me credit @stopitharry on ravelry and link the pattern to its source if you have any questions or need pattern support please contact me @stopitharry on ravelry i appreciate your support a huge thank you to my amazing testers
